media.caption: Spokane County Court House, Spokane, Washington

text.headline: Spokane County Court House, Spokane, Washington
text.text: Postcard is of the Spokane County Courthouse in Spokane, Washington. Postmark 9/8/1912, Spokane, WA. Destination San Francisco, CA.

text.headline: Good News - Power
text.text: Psychiana radio program episode begins with assurance that there is a Power that can get people what they desire. Robinson then discusses his early life failures and childhood seeking of some force that could turn his failures into success. He asserts the God-Power can turn our failures into success and bring us material and spiritual abundance.

media.caption: University of Idaho vs. University of Southern California (Football), 10/30/1925

text.headline: University of Idaho vs. University of Southern California (Football), 10/30/1925
text.text: Idaho Football vs. University of Southern California 10/30/1925 at Neale Stadium in Moscow, ID. Score: 7 - 51 (L).
